toc.value: Creating an S3 bucket in LocalStack

frontMatter.title: Local AWS with LocalStack using Docker Compose
frontMatter.author: Amrut Prabhu
frontMatter.summary: In this quick article, we will look at how you can mimic the behavior of communicating with AWS locally using LocalStack with docker-compose.

prev.title: Spring Boot 3.1 Docker Compose Support
prev.author: Amrut Prabhu
prev.summary: We will have a look at the new Spring Boot 3.1 feature supporting Docker Compose files on startup. No need to start Docker compose separately again

next.title: How to Search & Query Redis with A Spring Boot Application
next.author: Amrut Prabhu
next.summary: In this article, we will look into how you can search and query Redis using a Spring Boot Application and also visualize this using Redis Insights
